trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract base class for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ParameterDataSourceExpression"></xref> objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ParameterDataSourceExpression"></xref> class.
Loads the state of the values in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ParameterDataSourceExpression"></xref> object that must be persisted.
An object that represents the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ParameterDataSourceExpression"></xref> object.
Gets the parameters that are associated with this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression"></xref> object.
The parameters that are associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression"></xref> object.
Saves the current view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ParameterDataSourceExpression"></xref> object.
An object that contains the saved state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ParameterDataSourceExpression"></xref> object.
Executes the expression by using the specified owner control, context, and data source.

Tracks view-state changes of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ParameterDataSourceExpression"></xref> object so that the changes can be stored in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object for the object.
